column1: 1941 Sept 29th Readings now taken from Snowden gauge which will be used throughout 1942
There are conflicting notes as to whether the Snowdon gauge was used 1941-1949 or whether it was always the autographic
1954 Not printed Readings from the old autographic gauge which was moved to beside the Snowdon gauge at Bala Brook
The engineer intends to discontinue these comparative readings between the two sites after 1955
